alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 22 at 1:26PM MST until December 23 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches below 6000 feet with up to 24 inches across mountains and passes above 6000 feet. Periods of gusty winds Thursday as high as 45 mph creating blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Central Mountains from the Stanley area south to Hailey. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible at times. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills
